title: View Photos of the 1977 BMW 320i
description: See the exterior and interior of the 1977 BMW 320i from every angle.
titleSummary: Classic BMW 320i: A Look Back at the '77 Model.
descriptionSummary: Explore a detailed look at the classic 1977 BMW 320i, showcasing both its beautiful design inside and out with comprehensive photos.

title: 1977 BMW 320i Test: Never Dull
description: The new, small jewel in the Bavarian crown.
titleSummary: Classic BMW Still Thrills After Decades on the Road.
descriptionSummary: Here are a few options, all under 30 words and with a natural flow: **Option 1:** Discover a delightful new treasure from Bavaria, adding sparkle to the region’s rich heritage. **Option 2:** Bavaria welcomes a charming addition—a small, brilliant find you won't want to miss. **Option 3:** Introducing a lovely new gem, proudly representing the beauty of Bavaria.

title: New Factory Five XTF Stage 1 Is a Less Complicated Desert Racer
description: While the original XTF kit for the Ford F-150 costs $24,990 and includes a new frame, the bolt-on Stage 1 delivers the same look for $9990.
titleSummary: Factory Five's Simplified Desert Racer Ready to Roll.
descriptionSummary: Want the lifted F-150 style without the hefty price tag? This affordable Stage 1 kit achieves a similar appearance for a fraction of the cost of a full frame replacement.

title: 2015 BMW 3-Series Wagon on Bring a Trailer Is Built to M3 Spec
description: BMW never sold an F80-generation M3 wagon in the U.S., so this seller built one.
titleSummary: Rare BMW 3-Series Wagon Modified with High-Performance M3 Parts Up For Auction.
descriptionSummary: This enthusiast took matters into their own hands, fabricating a rare M3 wagon—a model BMW never offered stateside—from an F80 generation chassis.

title: These 7 New Family Cars Will Hit the Market Within the Next Year
description: If you're shopping for a new car for your family, you might want to wait a few months, as a slew of new family-focused SUVs are set to hit the market soon.
titleSummary: Fresh Family Rides: 7 New Models Arriving Soon
descriptionSummary: Family car buyers should hold off on purchasing just yet! Several fresh SUV models designed for families are launching in the coming months.
